name: Acorn
0:
”Alexa, unlock door lock”
”Alexa,lock door lock”
”Alexa,lock the door lock”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hardware Requirements:
1. Oaks smart Lock
2. Oaks gateway - sold separately
3. Echo/Dot

Get Started:

1. Check that the Oaks app is able to lock/unlock using Bluetooth.

2. Check that the Oaks app is able to “remotely” lock/unlock using the Oaks gateway

3. Enable the Acorn skill in Alexa

4. Link the Oaks Smart Lock account and provide permission to access your locks.

5. Once Alexa discovers the Oaks smart Lock, you can issue voice commands to Alexa as outlined below:

Alexa, lock the door lock
(door lock is the name of smart lock,you can rename the smart lock in Oaks app)
Alexa, unlock door lock
(you should enable unlock feature in Alexa app)
